title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.306 - Self-responsible (self-pay) patient
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.306 - Self-responsible (self-pay) patient

State Regulations
A patient who pays either all or part of his hospital
bill from his own funds as opposed to third-party funds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.306

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
